markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Warden](/NPCs.aspx?ID=920)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wardens are the chief guardians of borders and frontiers. Whether they stand watch over a single village or an entire region, wardens keep a vigilant eye out for outside threats to their charges. Wardens are stalwart folk, often called to duty by Erastil to protect those around them. Be it times of war or upon the frontier, wardens are often the balanced edge of a blade between a community and the wilds at its fringes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Warden](/NPCs.aspx?ID=920)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 225</row>

**Perception** +12

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Bastard Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15), [Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), [Bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), [Compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16), [_+1 composite longbow_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (10 arrows), [Flint and Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=21), maps, [pup tent](/Equipment.aspx?ID=57), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 96

**Warding Strike <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger One of the warden's enemies within 100 feet attacks one of the warden's allies or a person the warden is sworn to protect; **Effect** The warden Strikes the triggering enemy. If the Strike hits, the enemy's attack is deflected, reducing its damage by 8, or by 16 if the warden's Strike was a critical hit.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bastard sword +16 ([two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +17 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+5 piercing

**Warden's Protection**   A warden deals an extra 1d8 damage to any creature trespassing on the territory the warden protects.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-189" />
name: Warden

Wardens are stalwart folk, often called to duty by Erastil to protect those around them. If the Strike hits, the enemy's attack is deflected, reducing its damage by 8, or by 16 if the warden's Strike was a critical hit. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action bastard sword +16 (two-hand d12), Damage 1d8+7 slashing Ranged Single Action composite longbow +17 (deadly 1d10, Magical, Propulsive, range increment 100 feet, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 1d8+5 piercing Warden's Protection A warden deals an extra 1d8 damage to any creature trespassing on the territory the warden protects.
